<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">      MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#af066b2b6a1013299bfca84fe8b798a0b">getInstr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a698b6937d98b7ee400dee8b7b3c8a4bd">setAsmPrinterFlag</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#a2a33c3bcd5f8b3cc9a7e074d7f25351fa7ceba9b37fa216e9828a10ca88a475e7">SPIRV::ASM&#95;PRINTER&#95;WIDTH16</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Bitwidth &lt;= 64) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t FullImm = Imm.getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, take the loop&#39;s rank (highest rank in the loop) as base.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since loops have a single latch, highest rank is easy to find.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PartialOrderingVisitor::visit(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Unused) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">  ToVisit.push(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> QueueIndex = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ToVisit.size() != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = ToVisit.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a63cfb2a0dae69153fd961eb335949caa">front</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">llvm::report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">      QueueIndex++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
